results.title: Effect of metformin on all-cause mortality and major adverse cardiovascular events: An updated meta-analysis of randomized controlled trials.
authors: SID-AMD joint Panel for Italian Guidelines on Treatment of Type 2 Diabetes
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ was associated with a nonsignificant reduction of all-cause mortality (n = 13 RCTs; @<m>DISEASE_Malignant_hyperthermia_susceptibility_type_1</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535694 @@@MH@@@-OR 0.80 [95% CI 0.60, 1.07]).

citations.NLM: Monami M, Candido R, Pintaudi B, Targher G, Mannucci E, SID-AMD joint Panel for Italian Guidelines on Treatment of Type 2 Diabetes. Effect of metformin on all-cause mortality and major adverse cardiovascular events: An updated meta-analysis of randomized controlled trials. Nutr Metab Cardiovasc Dis. 2021 Mar 10;31(3):699-704. PMID: 33549430
citations.BibTeX: @article{33549430, title={Effect of metformin on all-cause mortality and major adverse cardiovascular events: An updated meta-analysis of randomized controlled trials.}, author={Monami M and Candido R and Pintaudi B and Targher G and Mannucci E and SID-AMD joint Panel for Italian Guidelines on Treatment of Type 2 Diabetes}, journal={Nutr Metab Cardiovasc Dis}, volume={31}, number={3}, pages={699-704}}

results.title: Effect of metformin on cardiovascular events and mortality: a meta-analysis of randomized clinical trials.
results.text_hl: It is likely that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ monotherapy is associated with improved survival (@<m>DISEASE_Malignant_hyperthermia_susceptibility_type_1</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535694 @@@MH@@@-OR: 0.801[0.625-1.024], p = 0.076).

citations.NLM: Lamanna C, Monami M, Marchionni N, Mannucci E. Effect of metformin on cardiovascular events and mortality: a meta-analysis of randomized clinical trials. Diabetes Obes Metab. 2011 Mar;13(3):221-8. PMID: 21205121
